EmailTemplate.subject: VinPro Realignment Notification-Greg Burnett
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
As you know, VinSolutions is growing rapidly. We have made much advancement to ensure you receive the highest quality of service. As your VinPro, I want to remind you I am here for you and provide you with some helpful information.
Support related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST)
Customer Portal: The Portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
To receive the most expedient attention, please create a Support Ticket for all technical support issues. Please email the ticket number to me so that I have an opportunity to follow the ticket through to resolution in as timely and accurate a manner as possible.
Please feel free to call or email me at any time with any questions, comments and concerns you may have.
Greg Burnett has been a VinPro with VinSolutions since August of 2011. Prior to that he was in the car business for six years and during that time he worked in Sales, Business Development, and as a part of an Internet Department. Over those six years he developed a solid understanding of the way a dealership works. His ambition is to leverage that experience along with his knowledge of our products to help his dealers get the most from VinSolutions.
Sincerely,
Greg Burnett VinPro Mid States Region VinSolutions.com greg.burnett@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 150 C: 913-328-2734
